# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the algorithm type shown in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing an algorithm type

- **description**: A text representation of the algorithm type.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the algorithm type that’s suitable for output during debugging.
